original_text:
Hiram king of Tyre replied by letter to Solomon:
“Because the Lord loves his people, he has made you their king.”
korean_text: 두로 왕 후람이 솔로몬에게 답장하여 이르되 여호와께서 자기 백성을 사랑하시므로 당신을 세워 그들의 왕을 삼으셨도다

sentences.original_text: Hiram king of Tyre replied by letter
Because the Lord loves his people
he has made you their king
